dc:title: On Pilgrimage - November 1958
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A homey atmosphere prevails on a rainy Sunday although they are about to be evicted with no replacement house in sight. Mulls over reports of increased use of processed food and scavenging food on Staten Island.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 746 1958-11-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
